availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William T. Scott LOSER (Lexington, Kentucky, trader)

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, trader. Kentucky native. Son of Andrew T. Scott and Elizabeth Scott. Married to Mary Yoder Brown Scott. Student in Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1850. Trader with Joseph S. Scott in Lexington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 2, p. 236A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington, p. 426.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington Ward 2, p. 240A.
Find A Grave, "William T Scott (1833-1875)," Memorial #60045140, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/60045140 (accessed May 27, 2021).
